subject: fix(deploy): router base path and SVG font for GitHub Pages
body:
createWebHistory() needs import.meta.env.BASE_URL so vue-router
resolves routes correctly under a sub-path like /budgy-ting/.
SVG icon switched from Georgia (proprietary, absent in CI) to
generic serif so sharp/librsvg renders the B glyph on Ubuntu.

Tags: router, pwa, ci, deployment
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: deployment
Semver: patch
